synapse.title: Synapse logs
synapse.description: Logs output by Synapse, a Matrix homesever, under its default logging config.

sample.line: my-matrix-server-generic-worker-4 | 2023-01-27 09:47:09,818 - synapse.replication.tcp.client - 381 - ERROR - PUT-32992 - Timed out waiting for stream receipts

my-matrix-server-federation-sender-1 | 2023-01-25 20:56:20,995 - synapse.http.matrixfederationclient - 709 - WARNING - federation_transaction_transmission_loop-3 - {PUT-O-3} [example.com] Request failed: PUT matrix://example.com/_matrix/federation/v1/send/1674680155797: HttpResponseException('403: Forbidden')
my-matrix-server  | 2023-01-25 20:55:54,433 - synapse.storage.databases - 66 - INFO - main - [database config 'master']: Checking database server
